name: Tic Tac Toe to Toe
description:
Select a space and place your piece. Moves regenerate every half second. Place over an opponent and destroy their piece. Maintain 3 in a row long enough to win!

Press 1 for a single player game, 2 for a 2 player game.

PLAYER 1:     WASD  space

PLAYER 2:     IJKL  \
